parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the application group.

parameters.name: IsEnable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the event-triggered alert rule. Valid values:

true (default)

false

parameters.name: NamePrefix
parameters.description: The prefix in the name of the event-triggered alert rule.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number.

Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.

Pages start from page 1. Default value: 10.
